title: Can't log in EUNE
body: is it only me ? i try to log in and it gives a wrong password/username error , i make everything right and log in again and it takes ages to authenticate ..... are the servers down ?

replies.body: I'm not seeing any current EUNE login issues on our status page, so those issues should be cleared up at this point. Definitely hit me back up if you still can't get logged in though!

EUWest - Cant Login:  There is a unknown fault / problem: 

"Bei der Anmeldung ist ein unerwarteter Fehler aufgetreten. Bitte versuche e erneut. Wenn das Problem weiterhin besteht wende dich an den Spieler-Support unter support.riotagames.com"

tryed it many times ...no way.

Authentification ........a long time.... very long before.......then the massage.

I can't log in either I'm on euwest server, I check the support it says there we need to put our birthday, and that is for Eu server or else our account will be hold, I can't find where I can set my birthday though. :S
